Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 53rd overall pick, by Texas in 1965...
Released by Texas on 3/2/1965...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 3/2/1965 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/5/1966 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/8/1966 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 2/13/1967 (Going to CHC: SS W. Garrett. Going to NYM: LF B. Williams)...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1967, off Ken T. Johnson (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/1967, off Turk Farrell (PIT)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1968...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Minnesota on 1/31/1970 (Going to CHC: P B. Cueto. Going to MIN: SS W. Garrett, P A. Hrabosky, P C. Acosta)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Texas on 4/6/1970...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/29/1972, hitting .560 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Injured on 6/10/1972 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1977...
Injured on 5/3/1978 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 8-9 weeks...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1978...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against New York (A) on 5/24/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1980, hitting .556 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/4/1981, off Barry Lersch (DET)...
Injured on 5/12/1982 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1983, hitting .529 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/3/1984 to a 1-year deal worth $8,125,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/12/1985 to a 2-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Drafted in 5th round, 85th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1987...
Injured on 7/14/1987 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/16/1987 with a Bruised Ankle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/6/1992, off Charlie Lea (BOS)...
Injured on 7/20/1992 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/28/1992 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1993, off Jeff Zaske (TEX)...
